${modID}:SpectralMerchantEvent.NAME: Spectral Merchant
DESCRIPTIONS: You see a familiar figure, it seems to be the Merchant.
As you get closer, it suddenly turns around and a spectral shape flies at and through you. NL You are unharmed but it seems like you have lost something.
When it seemed to have calmed down it apologizes and offers you some reimbursement.
It apologizes again and says an awkward goodbye.

${modID}:WeirdJokerEvent.NAME: Weird Joker
DESCRIPTIONS: As you turn a corner you spot a disheveled stall with worn out wares. NL As you approach a funny looking creature asks if you are up for a trade.
Ohohoh, hahaha, let's see what i got here. NL This or that, that or this, take your pick. NL Don't worry, don't worry, nothing has been tampered with.

${modID}:JackInTheBoxEvent.NAME: Jack in the Box
DESCRIPTIONS: You come upon a strange box just large enough to fit you in. NL It even has a door with a sign on it that says: "Unparalleled strength requires a sacrifice"
The moment you close the door behind you, it feels like you are being drained while a wind up sounds starts playing.
Suddenly the feeling and the winding up stops and you here a click. A quiet voice whispers "What is thy destiny?".

When the words leave your mouth, the floor suddenly shoots up and launches you out the top of the box. NL During your flight a laughing voice continuously repeats "Jack in the box", but stops as soon as you finally land.
As you kick over the box an angry voice screams at you. A sudden spring shoots up from the box, hitting you. NL When recovering from the hit, you notice that some gold sprang out too.
